howToPlay.title: The Rules of FrenchQuest
howToPlay.objectiveText: Prove your French mastery by completing 10 quiz sessions. Each correct answer earns you XP to level up and coins to buy hints.
howToPlay.walletText: Your wallet is split into two distinct balances:
howToPlay.depositBalanceDesc: Deposit Balance (for playing): This is the money you deposit. It's used to pay entry fees for competition sessions.
howToPlay.winningsBalanceDesc: Winnings Balance (withdrawable): This is the money you earn. You can withdraw it or transfer it to your playing balance!
howToPlay.phasesTitle: üïπÔ∏è The Two Phases of the Game
howToPlay.phase1Text: These sessions are here to warm you up. Replay them as much as you want. You must get 70% correct answers to unlock the next session.
howToPlay.phase2Text: After paying the one-time entry fee, you access the competition. Each correct answer earns you rewards only once, and your winnings are added to your withdrawable balance.
howToPlay.referralText1: Share your unique code! You receive a
howToPlay.referralText2: bonus on your referrals' first deposit, and a
howToPlay.referralText3: bonus on their competition winnings, directly into your withdrawable balance!
howToPlay.goodLuck: Good luck, and may the best win!
howToPlay.transactionsText: To ensure security and fairness, all financial transactions are processed manually.
howToPlay.depositTime: Deposits: Your balance is credited within a maximum of 24 hours after your payment is verified.
howToPlay.withdrawalTime: Withdrawals: Your winnings are sent to your Mobile Money number within 24 business hours after your request.
